judges: Before Maxey, C. J.,Drew, Linn, Stern, Stearne and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge van Roden. Costs to be paid out of the corpus of the estate.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph G. Denny, Jr., with him William, F. Bohlen and Allen 8. Olmsted, 2nd, for appellants.
Read Rocap, Jr., with him Thomas H. Broomall, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Butler Estate.
Argued January 11,1950.
Before Maxey, C. J.,Drew, Linn, Stern, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
March 20,1950:
Joseph G. Denny, Jr., with him William, F. Bohlen and Allen 8. Olmsted, 2nd, for appellants.
Read Rocap, Jr., with him Thomas H. Broomall, for appellee.
